column1: Tweets~Nick or Schmidt?
Nick Miller: turning lemonade into lemons since 1981.~Nick
Do I regret it? Yes. Would I do it again? Probably.~Nick
I have decided to give up on women and put all of that energy into tomatoes.~Nick
A bank is just a paper bag but with fancier walls.~Nick
I am not a successful adult. I don’t eat vegetables and/or take care of myself.~Nick
I don’t know what ‘mazel tov’ means
column2: but it doesn’t sound good.~Nick

column1: Look
column2: we’re not trying to be mean. We just don’t want you to be yourself… in any way.~Nick

column1: I need to eat my way out of a sandwich house.~Nick
I once saw a zebra named Gavin give birth at the zoo and I cried hysterically.~Nick
I don’t trust fish. They breathe water… that’s crazy.~Nick
Life sucks! And then it gets better
column2: and then it sucks again.~Nick

column1: I don’t believe dinosaurs existed. I’ve seen the science. I don’t believe it.~Nick
I once had a bass teacher when I was younger who did the standing bass. He had a very weird smell
column2: and I still think about it.~Nick

column1: I like chipmunks more than squirrels.~Nick
This place is fancy and I don’t know which fork to kill myself with.~Nick
I'd give you a hug
column2: but my shirt smells pretty weird today.~Nick

column1: Trust me
column2: I'm wearing frozen underpants right now and I feel amazing.~Nick

column1: If I can't have a kid with a woman
column2: then maybe I'll have one with my cousin.~Nick

column1: I once tried on my girl cousin’s wool tights and I didn’t hate how it felt.~Nick
Sponges make me feel exhilarated.~Nick
Just be yourself
column2: and if he’s not into Jessica Day

column1: Just drive the car. I gotta tell my girlfriend that I don't love her so she doesn't leave me.~Nick
I'm pretty sure I'm having a heart attack
column2: and I haven't arranged for anyone to clear my browser history. I wasn't building a bomb

column1: The eyeball fell off
column2: that's how you know it's good!~Nick

column1: I stole that from Nelson Mandela. I added the part about the Penguin and the Riddler.~Nick
I know this isn't gonna end well
column2: but the middle part is gonna be awesome.~Nick

column1: I hate doors!~Nick
I've never been an inspiration before...I don't like this much responsibility.~Nick
I really like when a rap song uses a choir. It makes me feel really happy with all those ladies' voices coming and then the guy's rapping. I think it's awesome.~Nick
If I had a dollar for every person I couldn't hang out with because they hate Schmidt
column2: I'd be rich. Like fill my gas tank up all the way rich.~Nick

column1: Schmidt happens!~Schmidt
My tires were stolen by STREET YOUTHS!~Schmidt
The economy stinks
column2: bees are dying
column3: and movies are pretty much all sequels now.~Schmidt

column1: ALL DAY!~Schmidt
Judaism
column2: son!~Schmidt

column1: Bathtubs are medieval filth cauldrons.~Schmidt
I had figure skating lessons until I was thirteen
column2: and then my mom sobered up and realized I was a boy.~Schmidt

column1: It’s like you’re ripping the side block out of my mental Jenga.~Schmidt
Can we just take a moment to celebrate me?~Schmidt
DAMP!~Schmidt
I love mango chutney.~Schmidt
I’m not being overdramatic when I say I would rather sit naked on a hot grill than wear something off the rack.~Schmidt
She has a flip phone
column2: Jess. She’s either poor or a time traveller.~Schmidt

column1: I don’t have sperms. I have tadpoles…of the gods.~Schmidt
If pot were a piano
column2: Nick would be a 9-year-old Chinese girl.~Schmidt

column1: Well
column2: you have found my flabbergast button
column3: and guess what? You’ve pressed it.~Schmidt

column1: I can’t talk right now. I’m writing a strongly worded e-mail to my florist.~Schmidt
Without ash to rise from
column2: the phoenix would just be a bird getting up.~Schmidt

column1: Do you just walk around all day thinking about other people’s feelings? How do you get anything done?~Schmidt
Now
column2: if you’ll excuse me
column3: I have to go water my succulents.~Schmidt

column1: You just earned a special thank you in my autobiography.~Schmidt
The only acceptable pet for a man to have is a saltwater fish.~Schmidt
We are gathered here today to celebrate this thing called… Schmidt.~Schmidt
Nick is delicate. Like a flower. Like a chubby
column2: damaged flower who hates himself.~Schmidt

column1: Old people freak me out. With their hands and their legs. They’re like the people version of pleated pants.~Schmidt
Damn it! I can’t find my driving moccasins anywhere!~Schmidt
Are you cooking a frittata in a sauce pan? What is this – prison?~Schmidt
Have you seen my sharkskin laptop sleeve?~Schmidt
This is a horrible neighborhood. There are youths everywhere!~Schmidt
Befriending Kanye is the most efficient way for me to jump social strata. Now all I have to do is meet him
column2: and then dazzle him to the point that we’re each other’s last call before bed.~Schmidt
